title: Playing hurt, Warriors, World Cup, Raiders, & Anthony Davis
itunes:title: Playing hurt, Warriors, World Cup, Raiders, & Anthony Davis
description:
Colin defends athletes playing hurt and the Golden State Warriors playing F Kevin Durant. He also talks about the fake outrage over the USWNT 13-0 victory over Thailand, the Oakland Raiders being on Hard Knocks, and the free agent status of New Orleans Pelicans F Anthony Davis. Guests include Nick Wright, Ric Bucher, Bucky Brooks, and Cuttino Mobley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
